text: Mitzi Shore (née Saidel; July 25, 1930 – April 11, 2018) was an American comedy club owner. She founded The Comedy Store in Los Angeles in 1972 and became owner two years later. She was born in Green Bay, Wisconsin. Through the club, she has had a huge influence on the careers of up-and-coming comedians for years. Mitzi also founded Comedy Channel Inc. in 1982. Mitzi died of Parkinson's disease on April 11, 2018 in West Hollywood, California at the age of 87.Comedy Store Owner Mitzi Shore Dead at 87 ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Businesspeople from Wisconsin Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles Category:People from Green Bay, Wisconsin
title: Mitzi Shore
